title: Identity Implanter

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Every night, you may visit someone to change their role to another one of the same faction. With the sole exception of the Sith, you may not change the roles of conversion immune players.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Their new role is random.
- Targeting a good role has a 10(X-2)+Y% chance of corrupting them, turning them into either a member of the local REF or neutral. With X being the number of evils currently present on the rolelist and Y being the number of dead players

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see at least one person you gave a new identity to live their new life to the fullest  (AKA, live to see at least one player you gave a new role to win.)

desc:
